comments:

This one is bizzarre.  However, someone else opened a similar report yesterday.
Could you please attach or email me your workspace (if it is of a reasonable 
size).

By the way, were you able to import using the other option?  i.e. using 
the "Select from all plug-ins and fragments found at the specified location" 
option on the first page.
*** Bug 46361 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Was finally able to reproduce it.
This happens at a time when the import is invoked at a time when a plug-in 
project is in the workspace, but no resource delta has been fired to add it to 
our model manager.  

Fixed.
*** Bug 46259 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
